Effect Description: Pull your limbs and head inside your shell to gain +5 AC until the start of your next turn.
You are immune to Critical Hits; attacks striking your shell become normal hits.
You can walk on vertical surfaces and ceilings without needing to make ability checks.
Advantage on saving throws to resist being disarmed or knocked off a surface.
Detect the presence of poisons, magic, or fresh blood within 60ft by tasting scent particles.
You gain Advantage on Survival checks to track a creature you have smelled before.
Make a bite attack with Reach (10ft range).
If you have a creature Grappled in your mouth, you can move them up to 10ft without a check.
Kick up mud or sand into an adjacent enemy's face. They are Blinded until they wipe it off (Action).
You gain a Swim Speed equal to your Walk Speed.
Change your skin color to match the environment, gaining Advantage on Stealth checks.
When hit by a spell attack, shift colors to reflect the energy, gaining Resistance to that damage type for the hit.
Rattle loudly. Enemies within 15ft must save (Willpower) or be Frightened for 1 round.
Shake softly to mimic an insect buzz, distracting a target to give an ally Advantage on their next attack.
Your natural Armor Class increases by +1.
Make an unarmed strike with your head. If it hits, the target is shoved back 5ft.
Jump onto a creature larger than you and attach. You move with them and have Advantage on attacks against them.
You cannot be moved against your will (Shoved/Pulled) while you are conscious and on solid ground.
Spin in a circle. All creatures within 5ft must save (Reflex) or be knocked Prone.
You have Advantage on Acrobatics checks to maintain balance on narrow ledges.
If you hit with a bite, inject venom. Target takes 1d6 Poison damage.
You appear unarmed even when inspected. You have Advantage on Deception checks regarding your threat level.
Enemies have Disadvantage on checks to escape your Grapple (teeth hook inwards).
Bite a target. If they are already bleeding or below half HP, deal double damage.
Flair your crest. Make an Intimidation check against a target's Insight to stun them with fear.
You recover from Exhaustion twice as fast during a Short Rest by regulating heat through your crest.
Lock eyes with a target. They are Charmed by you until you or your allies attack them.
You can see in Dim Light as if it were Bright Light.
Amplify your voice to be heard up to 1 mile away, or to deal Thunder damage in a 10ft cone.
You can hold your breath for up to 1 hour.
You are immune to being Blinded by sand, dust, or bright light.
Enter a state that perfectly mimics a statue or dead body. Perception checks to spot life have Disadvantage.
Detect living creatures within 30ft even through darkness, fog, or invisibility.
You automatically detect sudden drops in temperature or the presence of undead (cold bodies).
You can breathe air and water.
Advantage on saving throws against inhaled poisons or gas clouds.
While swimming, you can Dash as a Bonus Action.
When hit by a water-based attack or current, you remain upright and are not pushed.
Make a Grapple attempt or disarm attempt against a target 10ft away.
Snatch a small projectile (arrow/rock) out of the air to reduce damage to 0.
You can see 180 degrees. You cannot be Flanked.
Analyze a target. Your next attack against them has +2 Accuracy.
When falling, you can move 2ft horizontally for every 1ft you fall.
You take no damage from falls of 30ft or less.
When hit by a Radiant or Light-based attack, reduce damage by half.
Reflect light into an enemy's eyes. They must save or be Blinded for 1 turn.

Type: You cannot be disarmed or forced to drop (Jaw lock).
